solution_line_template: The train ride takes Andrew {multiplier_train_subway}*{subway_time} = <<{multiplier_train_subway}*{subway_time}={train_time}>>{train_time} hours.
Together, the subway ride and the train ride take Andrew {subway_time}+{train_time} = <<{subway_time}+{train_time}={subway_train_total_time}>>{subway_train_total_time} hours.

With an additional bike ride of {bike_time} hours to reach the Bronx, Andrew takes {subway_train_total_time}+{bike_time} = <<{subway_train_total_time}+{bike_time}={total_travel_time}>>{total_travel_time} hours to travel from Manhattan to the Bronx.
